name: Heavily Armed
description: Heavily Armed is a 3rd person shooter with unrelenting gun battles. You play an amnesiac cyborg in the futuristic metropolis of Grid City. The goal of the game is to discover your identity and uncover the mystery of your hidden human past.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/Vista/XP Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 1 GB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0
